akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 104–46, title V, § 509, Nov. 13, 1995, 109 Stat. 421

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 9306. Repealed. Pub. L. 104–46, title V, § 509, Nov. 13, 1995, 109 Stat. 421
Section, Pub. L. 96–386, § 7, Oct. 7, 1980, 94 Stat. 1542, related to establishment, membership, duties, etc., of technical panel on magnetic fusion and required panel to submit to Energy Research Advisory Board on at least a triennial basis a written report of its findings and recommendations with regard to magnetic fusion program.
